help:
The heligrab resource allows you to jump, grab and hang onto parts of helicopters To grab on to a helicopter, you must be standing with your hands close to the helicopter rails and press DOUBLE LSHIFT, or write the grab command.
By default, valid commands are: /grab (grabs onto a helicopter) /helidrop (drops off a helicopter)
These commands are also bound to the keys 'jump' (grab) and 'backspace' (helidrop) by default
The key binds can be modified in the binds menu in the MTA settings
You can also bind the commands to keys yourself with: /bind key state command (eg: "/bind lshift down grab")
